name: Epic Thrust
description:
See the new, revamped version of this game - Rocket Core!

Take on the role of a treasure hunting dude/ette, strap on your jetpack, and explore the depths of an unknown planet in search of lost loot. Avoid alien monsters, ghosts, traps, and other super deadly stuff that are the only things between you and ungodly riches! Features a bangin' chiptune soundtrack!

A retro inspired platformer created for the "Weirder Stuff" Game Jam. We thought it'd be fun to self-impose a CGA color palette to see if we could make something decent with such a limited base of colors. We had to cheat a little and use one shade of grey, as well as the dark cyan and dark purple.

Please leave any comments, we love to get feedback!

Thanks for playing!
